thread.title: Drew Brees Midweek Press Conference Prior To Game Against Colts
thread.title_full: Drew Brees Midweek Press Conference Prior To Game Against Colts

author: Steve Peloquin
title: Drew Brees Midweek Press Conference Prior To Game Against Colts
text:
Drew Brees Midweek Press Conference Prior To Game Against Colts By Steve Peloquin October 22, 2015 2:05 AM (Photo by Rich Schultz /Getty Images) 

New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees met with members of the media on Wednesday, four days before he and his teammates travel to Indianapolis, Indiana to take on the Indianapolis Colts. 
The Saints, fresh off their 31-21 win over the Atlanta Falcons on October 15, are currently 2-4, while the Colts stand at 3-3.
